languages.text: [Перебить Стракса] "Отрицаю весь этот навет. Обвинения сфабрикованы, а суд над Вольным Торговцем — фарс!"
[Interrupt Strachs] "I deny the whole pack of lies. The charges are fabricated, and this trial of a Rogue Trader is a farce!"
languages.original_text: [Перебить Стракса] "Отрицаю весь этот навет. Обвинения сфабрикованы, а суд над Вольным Торговцем — фарс!"

traits.locale_text: [Interrupt Strachs] "I deny the whole pack of lies. The charges are fabricated, and this trial of a Rogue Trader is a farce!"
[Interrupt Strachs] "I deny the whole pack of lies. The charges are fabricated, and this trial of a Rogue Trader is a farce!"
[Interrupt Strachs] "I deny the whole pack of lies. The charges are fabricated, and this trial of a Rogue Trader is a farce!"
[Interrupt Strachs] "I deny the whole pack of lies. The charges are fabricated, and this trial of a Rogue Trader is a farce!"
[Interrupt Strachs] "I deny the whole pack of lies. The charges are fabricated, and this trial of a Rogue Trader is a farce!"

languages.text: [Strachs unterbrechen] "Ich leugne all diese Lügen. Die Vorwürfe sind konstruiert und dieses Verfahren gegen {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} ist eine Farce."
languages.original_text: [Interrupt Strachs] "I deny the whole pack of lies. The charges are fabricated, and this trial of a Rogue Trader is a farce!"

traits.locale_text: [Strachs unterbrechen] "Ich leugne all diese Lügen. Die Vorwürfe sind konstruiert und dieses Verfahren gegen {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} ist eine Farce."

languages.text: [Interrompre Strachs] « Je rejette en bloc ce ramassis de mensonges. Les accusations sont fabriquées de toutes pièces et ce procès intenté à {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} n'est qu'une mascarade ! »
languages.original_text: [Interrupt Strachs] "I deny the whole pack of lies. The charges are fabricated, and this trial of a Rogue Trader is a farce!"

traits.locale_text: [Interrompre Strachs] « Je rejette en bloc ce ramassis de mensonges. Les accusations sont fabriquées de toutes pièces et ce procès intenté à {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} n'est qu'une mascarade ! »

languages.text: [打断斯塔克斯的发言]“我否认这些谎言，所有的指控都是凭空捏造的。这场针对行商浪人的审判就是一出闹剧！”
languages.original_text: [Interrupt Strachs] "I deny the whole pack of lies. The charges are fabricated, and this trial of a Rogue Trader is a farce!"

traits.locale_text: [打断斯塔克斯的发言]“我否认这些谎言，所有的指控都是凭空捏造的。这场针对行商浪人的审判就是一出闹剧！”

languages.text: [Interrumpir a Strachs] «Niego toda esa sarta de mentiras. ¡Los cargos están falsificados y este juicio a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente es una farsa!».
languages.original_text: [Interrupt Strachs] "I deny the whole pack of lies. The charges are fabricated, and this trial of a Rogue Trader is a farce!"

traits.locale_text: [Interrumpir a Strachs] «Niego toda esa sarta de mentiras. ¡Los cargos están falsificados y este juicio a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente es una farsa!».

languages.text: [ストラッチスの話を遮る]「その嘘っぱちの言い分を全て否定する。告発はでっち上げだ。このローグトレーダーの裁判は茶番だ！」
languages.original_text: [Interrupt Strachs] "I deny the whole pack of lies. The charges are fabricated, and this trial of a Rogue Trader is a farce!"

traits.locale_text: [ストラッチスの話を遮る]「その嘘っぱちの言い分を全て否定する。告発はでっち上げだ。このローグトレーダーの裁判は茶番だ！」

languages.text: [Strachs'ın sözünü kes] "Bu yalanları reddediyorum. Hepsi uydurmadır... Bir Hür Tacir'in yargılandığı nerede görülmüş?"
languages.original_text: [Interrupt Strachs] "I deny the whole pack of lies. The charges are fabricated, and this trial of a Rogue Trader is a farce!"

traits.locale_text: [Strachs'ın sözünü kes] "Bu yalanları komple reddediyorum. Hepsi uydurmadır... Bir Hür Tacir'in yargılandığı nerede görülmüş?"
